participant_1.name: Eleanor
participant_1.personality: Eleanor is wise and nostalgic, with a profound appreciation for life's simple joys. She has a vibrant spirit despite her age.
participant_1.background: i am very strong for my age. i'm 100 years old. i remember when nobody had a television. i love to drink wine and dance in the moonlight.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Jake is adventurous and practical, always seeking new experiences and learning from them. He has a down-to-earth nature.
participant_2.background: i walk dogs for a living. my parents taught me survival skills. i'm an avid kayaker. i enjoy reading journals and guides related to psychology.
